mapper.sql: ID, EXH_TYPE, PRODUCT_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into T_PRODUCT_SHELF (ID, EXH_TYPE, PRODUCT_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{exhType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID,

mapper.update:
update T_PRODUCT_SHELF
EXH_TYPE = #{exhType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_PRODUCT_SHELF set EXH_TYPE = #{exhType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT s.PRODUCT_ID,p.PRODUCT_NAME,s.EXH_TYPE,s.STATUS from T_PRODUCT_SHELF s,T_PRODUCT_COMMON p WHERE s.STATUS='1' AND s.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID;
SELECT PRODUCT_ID,EXH_TYPE,STATUS from T_PRODUCT_SHELF WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
insert into T_PRODUCT_SHELF (EXH_TYPE, PRODUCT_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE) values
(#{item.exhType},#{item.productId},#{item.status},#{item.createDate},#{item.updateDate},#{item.effectiveDate},#{item.expiryDate})
mapper.update: update T_PRODUCT_SHELF set STATUS = '0' where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXH_TYPE = #{exhType,jdbcType=CHAR};
